quote_first: He strolled across the tarmac to the waiting plane
quote_last: . The plane carrying the icon would be touching down in Washington in about two hours.
title: A Matter of Honor
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: in the evening she had died, and her frantic husband had made a frightful scene in his efforts to kill West, whom he wildly blamed for not saving her life. Friends had held him when he drew a stiletto, but West departed amidst his inhuman shrieks, curses, and oaths of vengeance.
title: Herbert West - Reanimator
author: H.P. Lovecraft
